title: Are Windmill Turbine Blades Buried in Wyoming Landfill?
subtitle: At least 90% of a wind turbine is recyclable.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The “wind turbine graveyard” in Casper, Wyoming, is home to more than 1,100 wind turbine blades that have been disposed of and buried in a local landfill since 2019.
